page.title: 10RECREATION IN GRANGETOWN
page.content:
{SPORTS SURVEY {} In a Sports survey, Sevenoaks Park (172/752) was the most popular of the area's amenities. Three out of every four people said they used the park for one reason or another. Both Murches Gardens (178/755) and Jubilee Park (163/758) were used by less than half the people surveyed.
St.Patrick's Youth Centre (175/753) was built in 1883 and provides several facilities. There is Keep-Fit, Snooker, Darts, Weight-Training and Football,as well as a floodlit area. However only one in three said they used the centre; of those who did, most said they attended at least once a week. Most of those who did not attend thought it a good idea but did not have time to go there.
